title: Model Redirect
description: Configure automatic model redirect mapping with weighted channel selection
enableDesc: Automatically redirect standard model requests to optimal channels based on priority and weight
standardModelsDesc: Select the standard models to generate redirect mappings for

advanced.title: Advanced Scoring
advanced.usedQuotaScaleDesc: Divisor for used quota penalty calculation (default: 0.25)
advanced.usedQuotaCapDesc: Maximum adjustment value for used quota penalty (default: 1.5)

dev.title: Development & Testing
dev.useMockDataDesc: Enable mock channel data for testing without live New API credentials

messages.updateFailed: Failed to update model redirect settings
messages.noModelsSelected: Please select at least one standard model
